document.full_text: united states coach bob bradley has recalled forward freddy adu, naming the former 'gold boy' of american soccer, in the 23-man squad for next month's concacaf gold cup and the june 4 friendly against world champions spain.
document.title: adu makes surprise return to u.s. soccer team for gold cup
lines_and_colors: united states coach bob bradley has recalled forward freddy adu, naming the former 'gold boy' of american soccer, in the 23-man squad for next month's concacaf gold cup and the june 4 friendly against world champions spain.
